scripts.build:backend: npm run clean:backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c config/backend.config.js --progress --display-max-modules 0 --display-entrypoints false
scripts.build:crawler: npm run clean:crawler && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c config/crawler.config.js --progress --display-max-modules 0 --display-entrypoints false
scripts.build:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c config/frontend.config.js --progress --display-max-modules 0 --display-entrypoints false
scripts.watch:backend: npm run clean:backend && webpack -c config/backend.config.js -w --mode development --progress --display-max-modules 0 --display-entrypoints false
scripts.watch:crawler: npm run clean:crawler && webpack -c config/crawler.config.js -w --mode development --progress --display-max-modules 0 --display-entrypoints false
scripts.watch:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && webpack -c config/frontend.config.js -w --mode development --progress
